諽字的基本解释

諽
gé
整饬。
古同“革”，改变。
谨严，谨慎。

諽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gé］
［《廣韻》古核切，入麥，見。］
［《廣韻》楷革切，入麥，溪。］
文饰。

諽字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諽； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1173第01
【唐韻】古覈切【集韻】各核切，?音隔。【說文】飾也。一曰更也。又【類篇】謹也。　又人名。與諽、希諽，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【玉篇】科核切【廣韻】稭革切【集韻】克革切，?鏗入聲。又【集韻】【類篇】?訖力切，音殛。義?同。　【集韻】或作愅。【正字通】本从?作〈言?〉。

諽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
諽字的起名意思

暂无。

gé
Trimming.
Gu Tong "revolution", change.
Be careful and cautious.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gé］
["Guangyun" ancient nuclear cut, enter the wheat, see. ]
["Guangyun" regular leather cut, into wheat, stream. ]
Wen decorated.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諽; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1173 01
[Tang Yun] Ancient nuclear cut [Ji Yun] Each nuclear cut, sound separated. [Said the text] also decorated. One said more. Also 【Classes】I would like to.　Another name. With 髽, Xi 髽, see [Song History · Clan Table].　[Jade chapter] Kehe cut [Guang Yun] straw leather cut [Ji Yun] Ke leather cut,? Keng enters the sound. Also 【Jiyun】【Class Chapter】? Full force cut, the sound is down. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】Or make a fright. [Zhengzitong] Bencong? Make "Speech?".
